constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 115 (Thursday, July 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BRENDAN F. BOYLE of Pennsylvania:
H.R. 4303.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 of the U.S. Constitution
under the General Welfare Clause.
[Page H3601]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

title: Labor Market Response Act
